meanings.sent1: We arrived prerehearsal to set up the stage.
meanings.sent2: The actors gathered prerehearsal to discuss their roles.
meanings.sent3: The director always arrives prerehearsal to ensure everything is ready.
meanings.sent4: The excitement builds prerehearsal as everyone prepares for the show.
meanings.sent5: Prerehearsal, the crew checks the lighting and sound equipment.

meanings.definition: A rehearsal that takes place before the main event.
meanings.sent1: The prerehearsal helped the actors understand their cues.
meanings.sent2: During the prerehearsal, the dancers practiced their routine.
meanings.sent3: The cat unexpectedly joined the prerehearsal, causing laughter among the cast.
meanings.sent4: The prerehearsal was a glimpse into the magic of the upcoming performance.
meanings.sent5: In the prerehearsal, the energy of the cast was palpable.
